line: Section I: Loss of or Damage to The Vehicle Insured
label: heading

line: The Company will indemnify the insured against loss or damage to the vehicle
label: paragraph

line: insured hereunder and/or its accessories whilst thereon
label: paragraph

line: i) by fire explosion self ignition or lightning;
label: paragraph

line: ii) by burglary housebreaking or theft;
label: paragraph

line: iii) by riot and strike;
label: paragraph

line: iv) by earthquake (fire and shock damage);
label: paragraph

line: v) by flood typhoon hurricane
label: paragraph

line: hailstorm frost;
label: paragraph

line: vi) by accidental external means;
label: paragraph

line: vii) by malicious act;
label: paragraph

line: viii) by terrorist activity;
label: paragraph

line: storm tempest inundation cyclone
label: paragraph

line: ix) whilst in transit by road rail inland- waterway lift elevator or air;
label: paragraph

line: x) by landslide rockslide.
label: paragraph

line: Rate of Depreciation for painting: In the case of painting, the depreciation rate
label: paragraph

line: of 50% shall be applied only on the material cost of total painting charges. In case
label: paragraph

line: of a consolidated bill for painting charges, the material component shall be
label: paragraph

line: considered as 25% of total painting charges for the purpose of applying the
label: paragraph

line: depreciation.
label: paragraph

line: The Company shall not be liable to make any payment in respect of:
label: paragraph

line: a) Consequential loss, depreciation, wear and tear, mechanical or
label: paragraph

line: electrical breakdown failures or breakages;
label: paragraph

line: b) Damage to Tyres and Tubes unless the vehicle insured is damaged at
label: paragraph

line: the same time in which case the liability of the Company shall be limited
label: paragraph

line: to 50% of the cost of replacement.
label: paragraph

line: c) Loss of or damage to accessories by burglary housebreaking or theft
label: paragraph

line: unless the vehicle is stolen at the same time; and
label: paragraph

line: d) Any accidental loss or damage suffered whilst the insured or any
label: paragraph

line: person driving the vehicle with the knowledge and consent of the
label: paragraph

line: insured is under the influence of intoxicating liquor or drugs.
label: paragraph

line: In the event of the vehicle being disabled by reason of loss or damage covered
label: paragraph

line: under this Policy the Company will bear the reasonable cost of protection and
label: paragraph

line: removal to the nearest repairer and of redelivery to the Insured but not exceeding
label: paragraph

line: in all Rs.300/- in respect of any one accident.
label: paragraph

line: The insured may authorise the repair of the vehicle necessitated by damage for
label: paragraph

line: which the Company may be liable under this Policy provided that:-
label: paragraph

line: a) the estimated cost of such repair including replacements, if any, does
label: paragraph

line: not exceed Rs.150/-
label: paragraph

line: b) the Company is furnished forthwith a detailed estimate of the cost of
label: paragraph

line: repairs and
label: paragraph

line: c) the insured shall give the Company every assistance to see that such
label: paragraph

line: repair is necessary and the charges are reasonable.
